QuestData.Title: Wing Clip
QuestData.Description: The young fliers of this era are fascinating. Their exceptional agility and endurance were, in my time, the feats of incredibly skilled or mature fliers.$B$BThis would seem to indicate some kind of evolution in wing structure... Or perhaps a result of advancements in training? Induced genetic mutation? Selective breeding?$B$BGah! There's no way to know for certain without tissue samples.$B$BBring me their wings! And try not to ruin them in the process, will you? I need them intact!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 24 Needler Wings from Shek'zeer Needlers in the Clutches of Shek'zeer.
